UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cecropins from Plutella xylostella and Their Interaction with Metarhizium anisopliae.
Literature.Author: Ouyang L, Xu X, Freed S, Gao Y, Yu J, Wang S, Ju W, Zhang Y, Jin F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=2.5µM),Bacillus cereus(MIC=2.7µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=0.2µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens(MIC=1.3µM),Salmonella enterica(MIC=2.2µM),Metarhizium anisopliae CCTCCM 208173(MIC=6.5µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=11.0µM),Penicillium crustosum(MIC=12.0µM),Phytophthora litchii(MIC=12.0µM),Colletotrichum gloeosporioides Penz.(MIC=19.0µM),Colletotrichum orbiculare(MIC=20.0µM),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=9.0µM)
